hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas said:It is only a garment wholly made of silk which the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade, but there is no harm in the ornamented border and the wrap

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الْعَلَمِ وَخَيْطِ الْحَرِيرِ
chapter.eng-name: The Concession Allowing Markings And Silk Lines
